implementation_output.changes_summary: Restructured CLI to promote setup, quick-install, uninstall, and version as top-level commands. Removed add_typer() calls for setup_cmd and install_cmd subgroups. Updated tests to invoke commands via main app. All commands now work at top level matching spec d18.

results.details: Verified app.command() decorator properly registers setup_cmd.wizard, install_cmd.quick_install, and install_cmd.uninstall as top-level commands
All 8 tests pass: 5 in test_install_cmd.py (including new version test), 3 in test_setup_cmd.py
